name: RAK Porcelain Dinner Set - Classic White
description: Elegant 12-piece dinner set featuring hand-painted gold accents on pristine white porcelain. Each piece is carefully crafted using traditional techniques passed down through generations. The set includes 4 dinner plates, 4 salad plates, 4 bowls, and 4 cups with saucers. Perfect for formal dining occasions and special celebrations.

faqs.question: Is this dinner set dishwasher safe?
faqs.answer: Yes, this dinner set is dishwasher safe. However, we recommend using a gentle cycle and avoiding harsh detergents to preserve the hand-painted gold accents.

faqs.question: Can I use this set in the microwave?
faqs.answer: Yes, the porcelain is microwave safe. The gold accents are applied using food-safe materials that won't be affected by microwave heating.

faqs.question: How should I care for the hand-painted gold accents?
faqs.answer: To maintain the gold accents, hand wash with mild soap and avoid abrasive cleaners. The gold is applied using traditional techniques and will last for many years with proper care.

name: RAK Porcelain Tea Set - Blue Floral
description: Traditional 6-piece tea set featuring delicate blue floral patterns on white porcelain. This elegant set includes a teapot, sugar bowl, creamer, and 3 teacups with saucers. The intricate floral design is hand-painted using traditional Turkish techniques, making each piece unique. Perfect for afternoon tea and special occasions.

faqs.question: What is the capacity of the teapot?
faqs.answer: The teapot has a capacity of 1.2 liters, which is perfect for serving 4-6 cups of tea.

faqs.question: Are the floral patterns hand-painted?
faqs.answer: Yes, each piece features hand-painted floral patterns using traditional Turkish techniques. This means each piece is unique and has its own character.

name: RAK Porcelain Vase - Decorative
description: Handcrafted decorative vase featuring intricate geometric patterns in gold and blue on white porcelain. This stunning piece is perfect for displaying fresh flowers or as a standalone decorative element. The vase measures 12 inches in height and features a classic amphora shape with modern design elements.

faqs.question: Can this vase hold water for fresh flowers?
faqs.answer: Yes, this vase is water-tight and perfect for displaying fresh flowers. The porcelain is glazed to prevent water absorption.

faqs.question: Is this vase handmade?
faqs.answer: Yes, each vase is handcrafted by skilled artisans using traditional techniques. This ensures each piece is unique and of the highest quality.
